Heyo, Eugene here. I’m a rising web developer.

Hey there, I’m Eugene. I am currently enrolled as a freshman in the Honours Computer Science Co-op Program at the University of Waterloo.

My main interest lies in web development, but I also have a budding interest in AI as well!

Aside from programming, I’m a big anime enjoyer, gym rookie, and small-time gamer :)

I used to be a competitive figure skater and ice dancer! I competed for eight years and managed to rank provincially as a silver medalist in the pre-juvenile division!
